video_prompt: Subject's iridescent hair shimmers with shifting pink, blue, and green hues, catching light. Lips subtly part and close. Soft facial expressions evolve.
image_prompt: A striking, ethereal portrait of an individual with iridescent white hair shimmering with pink, blue, and green holographic highlights. The subject has fair skin, delicate features, and prominent light blue/lavender eyes. Full-frame, vertical composition, head and upper chest, dark background, realistic yet artistic style, soft lighting, luminous beauty.
refined_video_prompt: Iridescent hair actively shimmers, its pink, blue, and green hues fluidly shifting as light sweeps across it. Lips gently transition from closed, to subtly parted, and back again. Facial expressions softly and continuously transform, conveying evolving emotions.
